Text: CPU is one of my favorite mags, thanks!

Hi Malestrom_HH,
I have these heathkit electronic books in PDF format which I scanned;
DC Electronics
AC Electronics
Semiconductors

I paid over $1000 USD for these courses when I had the money 20 years ago. I know it sounds like a long time ago and they should be obsolete by now, but I have yet to find a better course in these subjects.

I'll check this torrent's comment for your reply (if u'r interested).
